Package.Name: Arty Splash Sphere
Package.Author: Spoter
Package.Description: This mod will draw a sphere marking the stun area.\r\n\r\nby Spoter

Package.Name: Auto-aim indicator (press Right-ALT to en-/disable)
Package.Description:
Allows you to auto aim onto a visable target (red outline) when you right click and hover over the enemy tank.
Locks only onto a target when manually highlighted, so it is legal now.

To enable or disable this mod, press the Right-ALT key.

Package.Name: 2 sec autoaim search
Package.Description: Search allows the player to right click and for 2 seconds it will snap on the first highlighted enemy.

Package.Name: 5 sec autoaim search
Package.Description: Search allows the player to right click and for 5 seconds it will snap on the first highlighted enemy.

Package.Name: infinite autoaim search
Package.Description: Search allows the player to right click, it will snap on the first highlighted enemy.

Package.Name: BalCalcMod
Package.Description: The mod is designed to remedy the situation where it is impossible to aim above the hill. (Overshooting)\r\n\r\nAttention: spamming the Q key can crash the game (WoT 1.8.0.0)

Package.Name: Battle Assistant v{version}
Package.Author: wotinspector. / reven86
Package.Description:
Enables an isometric view from Arty.

TO USE THIS MOD YOU MUST ACTIVATE (PURCHASE OR AD SUPPORTED) HERE: 
http://armorinspector.com/en/battleassistant
Package.UpdateComment: Version 2.2.7\r\nfixed "Can't connect to server" issue for some users.

Package.Name: Increased Smooth Time (0,5)
Package.Description: smoothes the mouse movement

Package.Name: Increased Zoom Speed
Package.Description: patch-file

Package.Name: Colored Silhouette (when aiming at tanks in battle)
Package.InternalNotes:
patches for -> scripts_config.xml

Gauss´ notice:
You want a Color? 
Find the RGB-Code, divide each value by 255. 
 1. number is Red, 2. number is Green, 3. number is Blue
The 4. number: 1 or 0 - En-/Disable Silhouette
Package.Description: This mod changes the silhouette color of tanks when you aim at them in battle.\r\nYou can select different colors for enemies and allies.

Package.Name: LightBlue RGB (10,120,255)
Package.Description:
Allied (yellow) & Enemy (blue) 
can be combined to get the same result

ergo: remove for release

Package.Name: Yellow RGB(255,255,0)
Package.Description:
Ingame_Aim_Outline_Friend_Blue_v1_colorBlind.xml

OLD: Ingame_Aim_Outline_Enemy_Allies_Colorblind_blue_v1.zip
NEW: Ingame_Aim_Outline_Enemy_Allies_Colorblind_Allies_Yellow.zip

Package.Name: colorblind (enable colorblind mode in your WoT settings)
LightBlue RGB (10,120,255)
Package.Description:
Allied (yellow) & Enemy (blue) 
can be combined to get the same result

ergo: remove for release

Package.Name: Yellow RGB(255,255,0)
Package.Description:
Ingame_Aim_Outline_Friend_Blue_v1_colorBlind.xml

OLD: Ingame_Aim_Outline_Enemy_Allies_Colorblind_blue_v1.zip
NEW: Ingame_Aim_Outline_Enemy_Allies_Colorblind_Allies_Yellow.zip

Package.Name: Disable sniper scope shadow/green effect (PMOD)
Package.Description:
Removes the shadow and green effect from the scope

ATTENTION:
If you are a user of xvm, we recommend to use the xvm camera options instead of PMOD.
You can find the settings in the xvm config builder section.

Package.Name: Dispersion Indicator (aim time)
Package.Description: Show convergence time of of gun's dispersion (aim time).

Package.Name: Extended Dispersion Info and Indicator
Package.Author: Chirimen
Package.Description:
- show convergence time of of gun's dispersion
- show angle of hull against direction of view
- could show many states of own vehicle by customize

KNOWN BUGS:
The focus on the chat window is lost after the battle starts. You need to click on the chat window to write a message.

WORKAROUND: 
Left click the mouse during the pre-battle countdown.

Package.Name: Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Indicators
Package.Description: Shows wether or not you can penetrate an enemy, in the form of showing the number

Package.Name: PMOD
Package.Description:
Shows wether or not you can penetrate an enemy, factoring in armor angles and normalization, in the form
 avg_gun_penetration/enemy_effective_armor

NOTE: Will alter zoom settings. Use the zoom config at the bottom of this section to alter.

Package.Name: Coloured
Package.Description:
Changes the colour based on the change to pen.

Red: "No Chance": Color Hex "E90000" = RGB(233,0,0)
Yellow: "Might Pen": Color Hex "FFAD00" =RGB(255,173,)
Green: "Should Pen": Color Hex "6BF40D" =RGB(107,244,13)

Package.Name: SafeShot
Package.Author: OldSkool
Package.Description: SafeShot prevents the loss of ammunition to allied tanks.\r\n(formerly preventing team damage)

Package.Name: Server-side Reticle
Package.Description: Shows where the server thinks you are aiming. \r\nServer crosshair must be enabled in game settings.

Package.Name: Awfultanker
Package.Description: Shows where the server thinks you are aiming. Server crosshair must be enabled in game settings.

Package.Name: PMOD
Package.Description: Shows where the server thinks you are aiming. Server crosshair must be enabled in game settings.

Package.Name: Server Turret Extended v{version}
Package.Author: Spoter
Package.Description:
-turns the tank turret along server coordinates 
-automatically activates “Stop for a shot” when the tank is braked
-auto-speed for wheeled vehicles [press ALT+R to en-/disable]

by Spoter

Package.Name: Projectile Flytime for SPG/Arty
Package.Description: This mod allows you to see the shell travel time for SPG shells. \r\n

Package.Name: Projectile Flytime for SPG/Arty by Oldskool
Package.Author: OldSkool
Package.Description:
This mod allows you to see the shell travel time for SPG shells. 

Configuration of the mod can be done ingame.

by oldskool

Package.Name: Easy Flytime by Budyx69
Package.Author: Budyx69
Package.Description: This mod allows you to see the shell travel time for SPG shells.

Package.Name: Target Arrow
Package.Author: HAWG
Package.Description: This mod replaces the standard attack marker arrows. \r\nIt will help you to see the focus fire request by teammates.

Package.Name: Zoom In (PMOD)
Package.Author: PMOD
Package.Description:
Zoom-In Options for use without XVM.

If you are using xvm, we recommend using the xvm camera options instead of PMOD.
You can find the settings in the xvm config builder section.

Package.Name: Modify TD Brake
Package.Description: Activate or deactivate the brake for tanks with limited horizontal guidance angles - self-propelled guns and tank destroyers.

Package.Name: Modify Starting zoom
Package.Description: Choose the starting zoom level when you activate the sniper view.

Package.Name: Enable pmod zoom indicator
Package.Description: Show zoom indicator (1x, 2x, ....16x,32x...) in combat interface with activated sniper view.

Package.Name: Zoom Out
Package.Description:
Zoom-Out Options for use without XVM.

If you are using XVM, we recommend using the xvm camera options instead.
You can find the settings in the xvm config builder section.

Package.Name: Arcade Zoom
Package.Description: Set how far you can zoom out in arcade mode in meters.

Package.Name: PostMortem Zoom
Package.Description: Set how far you can zoom out in postmortem mode in meters.

Package.Name: Stragetic (SPG) Zoom
Package.Description: Set how far you can zoom out in strategic mode (arty view) in meters.

Package.Name: Increase Scroll Speed
Package.Description: Your mouse wheel will be faster to scroll
